Operating  
with IntegrityPILLAR 4We believe that not only what we do, but 
how we act as a Company will shape 
Altra’s future. 
This is why we are unwavering in our 
pursuit to earn and maintain the trust 
of all our stakeholders by operating 
our business ethically and honestly. 
We do this by taking a thoughtful 
approach in all aspects of 
our work which is guided 
by strong controls and 
procedures to proactively 
manage and mitigate 
risks across our 
organization.
